list.title: NativeCommandManager#checkMaxAltitude
list.description: Checks if the given object's altitude is below the maximum allowed altitude.

list.title: NativeCommandManager#checkMinAltitude
list.description: Checks if the given object's altitude is above the minimum allowed altitude.

list.title: NativeCommandManager#computeMaxAltitude
list.description: Computes the maximum allowed altitude. If you want to have different max altitude for gameobject you should override this method

list.title: NativeCommandManager#computeMinAltitude
list.description: Computes the minimum allowed altitude. If you want to have different min altitude for gameobject you should override this method

list.title: NativeCommandManager#computeObjectSpeedRotate
list.description: If you want to have different rotation speed for gameobject you should override this method

list.title: NativeCommandManager#computeObjectSpeedTranslate
list.description: If you want to have different translation speed for gameobject you should override this method

list.title: NativeCommandManager#freeze
list.description: An object3D freezed cant be move by manager

list.title: NativeCommandManager#objectsMoving
list.description: state of the objects moving

list.title: NativeCommandManager#stop
list.description: End Movement of an object3D

list.title: NativeCommandManager#tick
list.description: Handles the tick event.

list.title: NativeCommandManager.ID_SCRIPT
list.description: Gets the script ID.

list.title: NativeCommandManager.move
list.description: Move object3D on a map

list.title: NativeCommandManager.moveBackward
list.description: Move backward object3D of a certain value

list.title: NativeCommandManager.moveDown
list.description: Move up object3D of a certain value

list.title: NativeCommandManager.moveForward
list.description: Move forward object3D of a certain value

list.title: NativeCommandManager.moveLeft
list.description: Move letf object3D of a certain value

list.title: NativeCommandManager.moveRight
list.description: Move right object3D of a certain value

list.title: NativeCommandManager.moveUp
list.description: Move up object3D of a certain value

list.title: NativeCommandManager.rotate
list.description: Rotate an object3D with an euler

list.description: Constructs an instance of AbstractMap.

list.description: Constant used in @ud-viz/game_shared_template & @ud-viz/game_browser_template

list.title: module.exports#ID_SCRIPT
list.description: Gets the script ID.

list.title: module.exports#ID_SCRIPT
list.description: Gets the script ID.

list.title: module.exports#getHeightValue
list.description: Gets the height value at the specified coordinates.

list.title: module.exports#init
list.description: Initializes the DragAndDropAvatar script.

list.title: module.exports#load
list.description: Loads the map.

list.title: module.exports#tick
list.description: Handles the tick event.

list.title: module.exports#updateElevation
list.description: Updates the elevation of the given game object.
